points.heading: Highlights of previous day
points.text: Analyse previous day calorie count including updates from first entry card.

points.heading: Performance review of last day
points.text: Review based on last day activity.

points.heading: Neuropi schedule
points.text: Show how many days the user has used this platform after subscription.

points.heading: Foods to avoid
points.text: List the food items to be avoided by the user according to the report.

points.heading: Meal reminder
points.text: Follow the advised time intervals between the food or meals. Eg: 2 hours between each meal.

points.heading: Things not to skip for today
points.text: Mention any important step as a reminder here.

points.heading: An expert piece of advice, often short and actionable, used to improve results or solve a problem quickly.
